beer.beer_description: Hop-forward beers weren’t popular when we started brewing in 1980. But we loved them, and knew that if we were going to open a brewery, we’d better make something distinctive. It’s been 40 years since then, and we’re still brewing what we love. This beer showcases the bold flavors and aromas of a classic West Coast IPA: intense pine and citrus with a deep gold color and slight caramel sweetness. Here’s to following your passion, and to the next 40 years.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 10 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 3!

user.bio: Australia's leading beer expert, as voted by a panel of peers.

user.bio: Drove the miles, paid the dues, broke my neck selling beer. Literally. South Austinite in exile. Boat rocker for life.
Untappd Moderator (M2) Melbourne, Australia. Lover of all things beer! Beer ratings and descriptions are my own.
An IPA a day keeps the doctor away (Dont hold me to that ...)

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 3 years on Untappd!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 135 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 28!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 6)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 7!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 190 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 39.

user.bio: I love IPAs, Belgians, stouts. Yup!

items.badge_description: ‘Tis the season to think about GIVING. Our incredible community has the collective power of good in their hands – donate to a local foodbank, shelter or support your local brewery. Share your experience on social media using #untappdgiving

Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 445 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher.  Try 5 more for Level 90!
